email_content:
Hi Sarah,

I hope you’re doing well. Thank you again for partnering with us on our upcoming Community Care Day.

Below is a consolidated snapshot of the event along with a few items where we’d love Helping Hands United’s input or confirmation.

Date: Tuesday, March 15, 2022
Time: 9:00 AM – 4:00 PM (set-up from 7:30 AM)
Location: St. Mary’s Parish Hall & surrounding grounds

Objectives
• Provide free meals, clothing and basic supplies to neighbors in need
• Offer complimentary medical check-ups
• Connect job-seekers with local employers through a mini job fair
• Host inclusive activities for children and families
• Strengthen collaboration between parish volunteers and HHU

Preliminary Agenda
09:00 AM  Opening remarks
09:30 AM  Clothing & food distribution begins
10:00 AM–1:00 PM  Medical clinic + Job fair
12:00 PM  Lunch service
01:00 PM–04:00 PM  Family activities & wrap-up

Volunteer Teams (current status)
• Parish community – final list to be confirmed this week
• Helping Hands United – confirmed (thank you!)
• Medical professionals – confirmed via Dr. Patel
• Local businesses for job fair – outreach in progress

Promotion Plan
• Flyers – design finalized; printing next week
• Announcements during church services – begin this Sunday
• HHU social media posts – once the final flyer is ready, could your team schedule posts for the first week of March?

Action Items / Questions for HHU
1. Could you confirm the names & contact details of your volunteers so we can add them to the master roster?
2. We’ll need several extra folding tables and chairs for the job-fair area. Would HHU be able to supply or help source these?
3. Please let me know if the medical volunteers have any special equipment or space requirements.
4. Feel free to suggest additional activities or resources that would enrich the day.

I’ve attached the full planning document for reference (let me know if you’d prefer it as a Google Doc instead).

Thank you for all that Helping Hands United does for our community. Looking forward to making Community Care Day a success together!

Warm regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Role]
St. Mary’s Parish
[Phone]
sensitive_items: Session with Michael R. on 10th February. Expressed concerns about his family's financial struggles and is looking forward to the support from the Community Care Day event.
